notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acs.cgd.9b00782.
Summary of band positions found in the fluid cell Raman spectroscopy analysis (Table S1). Background for the DFT modeling including the calculated values of the lattice zabuyelite parameters and band gap (Table S2) as well as Figure S1 showing the density of states for the valence and conduction band of zabuyelite ( PDF)
